text: Good morning from Yokosuka! It's a chilly winter morning with clear skies. Head over to the Yokosuka Countdown 2026 event happening tonight at Fureai Plaza and watch the parade at 10:00 AM on January 11th! Check out the winter illuminations at https://ja-yokosukahayama.or.jp/tourism/ #ウィンタークール (Yokosuka Countdown 2026 (よこすかカウントダウン 2026))

today.weather_text_ja: 晴れ　夕方　から　くもり

tomorrow.weather_text_ja: 晴れ　夕方　から　くもり　所により　夜　雨　で　雷を伴う
